TopicTitle: Texture Replacer and terrain textures are they possible to edit?

Articles.Content:
I've been tweaking textures and run in to a problem, heres my temp minmus..

And here it's up closer, can I change it to get it closer to my temp?

Couldn't find much on how to do it, so any ideas are welcome.
You need to use a plugin like Kopernicus to alter the actual terrain. Texture Replacer only can replace the "scaled space" texture, the one used from a distance and in the map view.
So Ill need to change some of the PQS code using Kopernicus. That'll be interesting. Thank you, that was what i was looking for.
